section.title: Order Reports Help.
section.para: The Order Reports provide general information about orders in the system.
If your reports look empty it may be required to initialize the warehouse entities in the BI component.

listitem.para: Click "Quick Init DataWarehouse". System will automatic initial Data in the warehouse for Reports

section.title: 1. Sales Order By Referrer Report
section.para: There are referrers, link, totals orders, quantity totals and amount totals. They are grouped by referrer.

section.title: 2. Sales Order By Channel Report
section.para: There are total Orders, total Items, quantity totals and amount totals. They are grouped by Sales Channel.

section.title: 3. Sale Orders Discount Code Report
section.para: There are order, product, promotion and discount. This report is list of All orders.

section.title: 4. Last Three Months Sales Report
section.para: There are products, prices, stock, sale out quantity and sale out total amount. This report is list of all products, it contains the sales and movements in last 3 months.

section.title: 5. Coupon Sales Report
section.para: This report lists promotions, total orders, percent of total orders, total orders amount, percent of total orders amount and shipping amounts.

section.title: 6. Sales Report
section.para: This Sales report contains paid and unpaid sales orders.

section.title: 7. Net Before Overhead Report
section.para: Net Before Overhead Report is the profit calculation of paid-shipped orders and all the occurred fee excluding the overhead cost. They are grouped by Product Store Id.(Demo data for Net Before Overhead Report have in Product Store Id "B2CStore")

section.title: 8. Product Demand Report
section.para: Product Demand Report is the report to show us which product sells good and which product doesnâ€™t sell good or not selling at all in one account as well as for all accounts in last 4 weeks. They are grouped by Product Store Id.(Demo data for Product Demand Report have in Product Store Id "B2CStore")
